remarks: Members of a quotient set do not overlap.  (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 12-Oct-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
statement:
qsdisj.1 $e |- ( ph -> R Er X ) $.
qsdisj.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A /. R ) ) $.
qsdisj.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( A /. R ) ) $.
qsdisj $p |- ( ph -> ( B = C \/ ( B i^i C ) = (/) ) ) $.
